LatestNews.Content: The Patriots have reportedly waived WR Greg Salas, RB Lex Hilliard and LB Mike Rivera.

LatestNews.Title: Report: Patriots throw in the towel on Salas

LatestNews.Content: Patriots acquired WR Greg Salas from the Rams in exchange for a conditional 2015 pick.
